name: FaceChallenge: A Camera Filter Game
description:
Let's put a smile on that face! #FaceChallenge

The purpose of this game is simple:
To see how far your character can run in 10 seconds - using your face as the controller! SMILE TO RUN!

Note that the top speed of the character is 12.4m/s when the smile progress circle is at 75%, after that the speed would be significantly slower. You have to control your smile!

Don't forget to share the screenshot/screencast of the game and challenge your friends!

***
